item.title: Inverted Pendulum
item.description: Top of the inverted pendulum Presentation Stabilization of an inverted pendulum is a common engineering challenge. Objective is to build a low-cost DIY1 platform to test various feedback control loop. This document describes the hardware and the theoretical model of the pendulum.
